Helper Function to Convert Date (or Date-time) Objects to Characters of dtc Format (-DTC type of variable)

Source: R/dev_utils.R
dev_util_convert_dtm_to_dtc.Rd

Helper Function to Convert Date (or Date-time) Objects to Characters of dtc Format (-DTC type of variable)

convert_dtm_to_dtc(dtm)

Arguments

dtm

date or date-time

Value

character

Examples

admiral:::convert_dtm_to_dtc(as.POSIXct(Sys.time()))
#> [1] "2022-05-20T16:44:47"
admiral:::convert_dtm_to_dtc(as.Date(Sys.time()))
#> [1] "2022-05-20T00:00:00"
